author: SteveL-MSFT
body:
fix Get-ComputerInfo return of status for DeviceGuard
fix corresponding tests
this is causing one of the failures in our nightly run

comments.author: SteveL-MSFT
comments.body: CI failure is on Start-Process which is affecting nightly runs.  I'm working on that today.

comments.author: SteveL-MSFT
comments.body: @TravisEz13 can you review the test change to Start-Process test?

title: Fix DeviceGuard data being returned from Get-ComputerInfo and Start-Process test failure
